resources.string: Operational violations such as permits and employee hygiene
An update is available. Do you want to update?
Plans/construction/alterations not in accordance with the Regulation [s. 3; s. 4]
Not Critical,Operation of an unapproved food premises [s. 6(1)]
Failure to hold a valid permit while operating a food service establishment [s. 8(1)]
Permit not posted in a conspicuous location [s. 8(7)]
Food contaminated or unfit for human consumption [s. 13]
Food not processed in a manner that makes it safe to eat [s. 14(1)]
Food not cooled in an acceptable manner [s. 12(a)]
Food not cooked or reheated in a manner that makes it safe to eat [s. 14(1)]
Cold potentially hazardous food stored/displayed above 4 °C [s. 14(2)]
Hot potentially hazardous food stored/displayed below 60 °C. [s. 14(2)]
Food not thawed in an acceptable manner [s. 14(2)]
Frozen potentially hazardous food stored/displayed above -18 °C. [s. 14(3)]
Operator has not provided acceptable written food handling procedures [s. 23]
Equipment/utensils/food contact surfaces not maintained in sanitary condition [s. 17(1)]
Equipment/utensils/food contact surfaces not properly washed and sanitized [s. 17(2)]
Equipment/facilities/hot and cold water for sanitary maintenance not adequate [s. 17(3); s. 4(1)(f)]
Conditions observed that may allow entrance/harbouring/breeding of pests [s. 26(b)(c)]
Food premises not maintained in a sanitary condition [s. 17(1)]
Equipment/utensils/food contact surfaces are not of suitable design/material [s. 16; s. 19]
Equipment/utensils/food contact surfaces are not in good working order [s. 16(b)]
Chemicals cleansers and similar agents stored or labeled improperly [s. 27]
Single use containers and utensils are used more than once [s. 20]
Premises not maintained as per approved plans [s. 6(1)(b)]
Items not required for food premises operation being stored on the premises [s. 18]
Live animal on the premises excluding guide animal in approved areas
Operator has not provided acceptable written sanitation procedures
Refrigeration units and hot holding equipment lack accurate thermometers
Adequate handwashing stations not available for employees
Employee does not wash hands properly or at adequate frequency
Employee lacks good personal hygiene clean clothing and hair control
Employee smoking in food preparation/processing/storage areas
Operator does not have FOODSAFE Level 1 or Equivalent
In operator’s absence no staff on duty has FOODSAFE Level 1 or equivalent
